channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Eventbrite Promoted Illegal Opioid Sales to People Searching for Addiction Recovery Help
item.description: A WIRED investigation found thousands of Eventbrite posts selling escort services and drugs like Xanax and oxycodone—some of which the company’s algor...

item.title: EU Council gives final nod to set up risk-based regulations for AI
item.description: It's a wrap: European Union lawmakers have given the final approval to set up the bloc's flagship, risk-based regulations for artificial intelligence....

item.title: The World Is Ignoring the Other Deadly Kind of Carbon
item.description: Not only is black carbon terrible for human health, but ever-fiercer wildfires are covering the Arctic with the dark particles, accelerating melting.

item.title: Vitesse, a payments and treasury management platform for insurers, raises $93M to fuel US expansion
item.description: London-based fintech Vitesse has closed a $93 million Series C round of funding led by investment giant KKR. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. F...

item.title: Scarlett Johansson Says OpenAI Ripped Off Her Voice for ChatGPT
item.description: In a scorching statement, Scarlett Johansson claims that after she turned down an invitation to voice ChatGPT, OpenAI brazenly mimicked her distinctiv...

item.title: Zen Educate raises $37M and acquires Aquinas Education as it tries to address the teacher shortage
item.description: Zen Educate, an online marketplace that connects schools with teachers, has raised $37 million in a Series B round of funding. The raise comes amid a ...

item.title: Apple’s Photo Bug Exposes the Myth of ‘Deleted’
item.description: An Apple Photos glitch, now fixed, is a reminder that digital bits of your life will live on forever.

item.title: Scarlett Johansson says that OpenAI approached her to use her voice
item.description: "When I heard the released demo, I was shocked, angered and in disbelief that Mr. Altman would pursue a voice that sounded so eerily similar to mine."...

item.title: Microsoft Surface Pro (11th Edition) and Surface Laptop (7th Edition): Specs, Prices, Features, Release Date
item.description: There's a new Surface Laptop and Surface Pro, plus a host of AI-powered tricks for Windows.

item.title: Aurora and Volvo unveil self-driving truck designed for a driverless future
